title: Ping lag
body: This is the fifth fucking time my ping is getting high from 13 to 50 every 5 fucking seconds and im seriously getting annoyed with it. And now a disconnection error which doesnt even allow me to reconnect till the game ends. And then i get 5 games low priority for fucking 20 mins for the 10th fucking times. Fix your fucking servers you illiterate cancerous pieces of fucking mongs

replies.body:
Yup, same thing happened to me.

I have a better connection to the NA overwatch server, than i do with the OCE league of legends server.
